result.title: Evaluation plan
result.description: This deliverable will describe the overall strategy that will be used to guide the evaluation of the demonstration pilots and use cases. result.title: Scalability, Interoperability and Definition Standards
result.description: This document will include i requirements for the realisation of a scalable data platform for cognitive ports and its related architecture ii the data flow exchange formats that serves as interfaces between the different services to simplify their orchestration to create a federated platform as a single entry point and iii the updated UNCEFACT Core Components Library that covers all the definitions of the terms used in support of the cognitive ports platform
